name: My coursework platformer game
description:
Simple one level game i created as my coursework for college. I made this game in less than a week. I decided to upload it here because when I want to share it with someone I can just give them URL to this page)

It does not have a lot in it, just one level with medium+ difficulty.

Your task is to complete the level by completing the parkour course.

Das it :)
